018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery.APIResource;
022import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
024import java.io.Reader;
025
026/**
027 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
030public class K8sDynamicStub
031        extends K8sGenericStub<K8sDynamicModel, K8sDynamicModels> {
032
033    /**
034     * Instantiates a new dynamic stub.
035     *
036     * @param objectClass the object class
037     * @param objectListClass the object list class
038     * @param client the client
039     * @param context the context
040     * @param namespace the namespace
041     * @param name the name
042     */
043    public K8sDynamicStub(Class<K8sDynamicModel> objectClass,
044            Class<K8sDynamicModels> objectListClass, K8sClient client,
045            APIResource context, String namespace, String name) {
046        super(objectClass, objectListClass, client, context, namespace, name);
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Get a dynamic object stub. If the version in parameter
051     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
052     * matching group and kind. 
053     *
054     * @param client the client
055     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
056     * @param namespace the namespace
057     * @param name the name
058     * @return the stub if the object exists
059     * @throws ApiException the api exception
060     */
061    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
062        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
063    public static K8sDynamicStub get(K8sClient client,
064            GroupVersionKind gvk, String namespace, String name)
065            throws ApiException {
066        return K8sGenericStub.get(K8sDynamicModel.class, K8sDynamicModels.class,
067            client, gvk, namespace, name, K8sDynamicStub::new);
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Get a dynamic object stub.
072     *
073     * @param client the client
074     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
075     * @param namespace the namespace
076     * @param name the name
077     * @return the stub if the object exists
078     * @throws ApiException the api exception
079     */
080    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
081        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
082    public static K8sDynamicStub get(K8sClient client,
083            APIResource context, String namespace, String name)
084            throws ApiException {
085        return K8sGenericStub.get(K8sDynamicModel.class, K8sDynamicModels.class,
086            client, context, namespace, name, K8sDynamicStub::new);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Creates a stub from yaml.
091     *
092     * @param client the client
093     * @param context the context
094     * @param yaml the yaml
095     * @return the k 8 s dynamic stub
096     * @throws ApiException the api exception
097     */
098    public static K8sDynamicStub createFromYaml(K8sClient client,
099            APIResource context, Reader yaml) throws ApiException {
100        var model = new K8sDynamicModel(client.getJSON().getGson(),
101            K8s.yamlToJson(client, yaml));
102        return K8sGenericStub.create(K8sDynamicModel.class,
103            K8sDynamicModels.class, client, context, model,
104            K8sDynamicStub::new);
105    }
106}
